dmca.title: Google DMCA - Jeanne Oliver
dmca.body:
Google

Re:DMCA complaint
Date : October 5, 22006

Dear Sir or Madam,

I would like to file a claim under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).

1. The copyrighted works at issue are:

a) the text that appears on
"http://www.croatiatraveller.com/southern_dalmatia/Dubrovnik/private_accommodation.htm"

b)The article "Visiting Croatia" which appears at "http://ezinearticles.com/?Visiting-Croatia&id=26231" in which reprint rights are granted only if the publisher includes the "resource box" which includes the name and website of the author.

2. A search on Google for:

a)"private accommodation Dubrovnik" returns the following infringing page: "http://www.dubrovnik-apartments.com/dubrovnik_private_accommodation.htm"

b) "Croatia a beginners guide" returns the following infringing page: " http://www.dubrovnik-apartments.com/weblog/2006/03/travel_to_croatia_a_beginners/" in which the name and website of the author are not included and which is presented as an original work.

3. I can be contacted at j4oliver@aol.com

4. Upon information and belief, it appears that the owner/administrator of the infringing web pages may be reached at kreso.gudelj@du.t-com.hr

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear under penalty of perjury that that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7.
Jeanne Oliver
20 bd Magnan
06200 Nice
France
tel/fax 33 4 97 07 19 15 j4oliver@aol.com
